review: I like the product, it basically integrates all my online streaming content (Amazon Prime, Netflix, HuluPlus). The problem is that when using the search function, it brings up paid Amazon content before other streaming options. I've searched for "20 Feet from Stardom", great documentary by the way, and the only option presented was to purchase it from Amazon (I have Amazon Prime, so it wasn't included in Amazon Prime Instant Video). I had to go to Netflix and manually search for it, and it was there, for free. I do understand that Amazon might be selling the hardware at a loss, in order to recoup the cost by selling streaming content, but why make it inconvenient for people who have other streaming content?Another feature I disliked was not being able to search YouTube using the voice search feature. I have to manually type what I'm looking for.Despite the voice search feature being heavily advertised, it's supremely limited, and Amazon will try to push their paid streaming content, even if it's available for free with other streaming services.
author: Simon

review: This device is cool, however like Netflix the movies are old and Amazon charges for many of the TV shows that Netflix gives you for free. So I suggest Fire HD your only loss will be the remote.
